name: Chrome: center images + dynamic background
description: Dark background for image-only page. Image horizontally centered. Background changes according cursor position and button state. For inspecting transparency.
additional_info: Test: Open this (credit). Mouse cursor - outside page: dark grey page. - outside image: black image background - outside image, holding button: light grey background - at image: white background - at image, holding button: chessboard grid Changelog - 2015-10-26 updated selector since `body` is no longer only-child`. Sorry, it must have been broken for quite a long time, I just forgot to push local version here. - 2017-02-09 chrome 56 introduced own native centering and (static) checkerboard background: updated the style to get "interactive dynamics" back. For Firefox: style 49276
